title: What age groups do you teach for piano and voice lessons?
content: I welcome students of all ages, from children to adults, for both piano and voice lessons. It's never too early or too late to start!

title: Can I take both piano and voice lessons with you?
content: Absolutely! Many of my students choose to study both piano and voice to enhance their musical abilities and diversify their skills.

title: What styles of music do you teach?
content: As a versatile instructor, I cover a wide range of musical styles to cater to each your interests and aspirations. I offer instruction in classical, musical theater, jazz, pop, and more.

title: How often should I schedule lessons?
content: I highly recommend having lessons once a week to allow consistent feedback, practice guidance, and gradual improvement.

title: How long are the lessons?
content: Lessons are offered for both 30 minutes and 1 hour. You have the flexibility to choose the duration that best fits your learning needs and preferences.

title: How much do lessons cost?
content: To provide you with the most accurate pricing information, please reach out via my contact page, and I'll be more than happy to assist you!
